entry.source: {F812}Setanta\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,411108}I have no idea what my master is{F801}thinking. But now that you've raised{F801}your blade at me, your life is over.{F801}{F802}Ending you is going to be easier{F801}than wringing that guard dog's neck!{F801}
